txt.en: Seek out Glynn Harper and tell him of your accomplishments.

'Well [placeholder], I must say that you've been quite the inspiration for me, and others here in the Lone-lands, I dare say. Your tales of derring-do and battles against the forces of evil have become quite well known around these parts\nNow if we just had a hundred or so more like you, I fancy I'd be a good sight less likely to find myself roasting on a troll's spit come year's end. But alas, as there is only one of you, I suppose I'd best finish up my compositions quickly.\nNow don't look so forlorn there - who knows? Perhaps the tales of your prowess will one day provide a measure of comfort to those who find themselves working in the slave mines of Mordor? That's a happy thought, no?'
Continue earning the trust of the inhabitants of the Lone-lands.
As barren as the Lone-lands are, there are still inhabitants who could use your aid, such as the Eglain of Ost Guruth.
